case_title: Sheikh JAN MUHAMMAD, ADVOCATE, LODHRAN vs Chaudhry MUHAMMAD ALTAF, ADVOCATE, BAR ASSOCIATION, LODHRAN and 9 others
respondent: Chaudhry MUHAMMAD ALTAF, ADVOCATE, BAR ASSOCIATION, LODHRAN and 9 others

key_points.challenged_office: General Secretary, District Bar Association, Lodhran
violations: Allowing ineligible voters from Bahawalpur and Multan
Waiving rules of Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
rules_cited: Rule 5.11(xii) of Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
key_points.decision: Election result for General Secretary set aside; re-polling ordered within 21 days.
